name: Mahjong Gold Free
description:
All hands on deck! Land ahoy!
Take part in the search for Long John Silver's treasure. Uncover the secrets of the old pirate. Remove Mah-jong tokens and travel around a distant island.

- A sea voyage in a Mahjong world!
- 120 unique levels and more than 6 hours of game-play
- A real treasure island!
- Beat the game with new rules
- The pirate's treasure awaits you!
